org.grouplens.lenskit.config

Class LenskitConfigDSL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.grapht.AbstractContext
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.inject.AbstractConfigContext
        • org.grouplens.lenskit.config.BindingDSL
          • org.grouplens.lenskit.config.LenskitConfigDSL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context, LenskitConfigContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlgorithmInstanceBuilderDelegate

    public class LenskitConfigDSL
extends BindingDSL
    Methods for the LensKit configuration DSL. This extends BindingDSL with additional methods available at the top level for configuring the LensKit configuration itself.
    Since:
    1.2
